alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Martin, southern Lawrence and southwestern Jackson Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Bedford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Martin, southern Lawrence and southwestern Jackson Counties, including the following locations... Huron, Tunnelton, Williams, Spring Mill State Park, Mitchell and Indian Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
